```{r ggplot Definitionen}
setwd("C:/Users/danie/Documents/Aktuelles/R_Kurs")

Mammel_data<-read.csv("Mammal-comeback-in-Europe-data-OWID-download.csv", sep=",", strip.white = TRUE)
colnames(Mammel_data)<-gsub("[[:punct:]]","_", colnames(Mammel_data))
Mammel_data$Average_relative_change_in_abundance<-gsub("%", "", Mammel_data$Average_relative_change_in_abundance%>%as.character)%>%as.numeric()
Mammel_data$Common_name_of_species<-factor(Mammel_data$Common_name_of_species, levels = Mammel_data$Common_name_of_species)
Mammel_data<-Mammel_data%>%arrange(desc(Average_relative_change_in_abundance))

x_label<-"Average relative change in the size of population (logarithmic scale)"
Mammel_seq<-1:length(Mammel_data[,1])

plot<-ggplot(Mammel_data, aes(y= rev(Common_name_of_species),x= Average_relative_change_in_abundance, label=Average_relative_change_in_abundance)) +
  geom_col(fill="grey",width=0.1)+
  theme_classic()+
  geom_point(size=2,col="slateblue")+
  scale_x_log10()+
  coord_cartesian(xlim=c(0.5,17000))+
  geom_text(position = position_nudge(x=0.15,y=0),size=3,aes(label=paste(format(Average_relative_change_in_abundance,big.mark=","), "%", sep="")))+
  xlab(x_label)+
  ylab("")+
  geom_text(data = Mammel_data, 
                   size=2,
                   mapping = aes(x = 0.8, y = 1:length(Mammel_data[,1]), label = paste(Start_year, " to 2016", sep="")),
                   inherit.aes = FALSE,
                   hjust = 1)+
  geom_point(aes(x=0.41, y=Mammel_seq), colour="black")
plot
```

```{r Plot}
df %>%
  mutate( value = as.double( str_replace( Average.relative.change.in.abundance, '%', '') ) ) %>% # Casting to variable type "double"
  mutate( value = log( value )) %>% # Changing to logarithmic scale
  mutate( Common.name.of.species = factor( Common.name.of.species) ) %>%
  mutate( start.and.end = paste( Start.year, "to", End.year )) %>%  # Time range label at line start
  mutate( Common.name.of.species = fct_reorder(Common.name.of.species, value)) %>% # Reorder animals by size
  ggplot( aes( x = Common.name.of.species, y = value, label = Average.relative.change.in.abundance)) +
    geom_segment( aes( xend=Common.name.of.species , yend= 0, y = value*0.98), arrow = arrow( length=unit(0.25,"cm"), ends = "first", type = "closed"), colour = "#B7B7B7") + # Adding arrows
    geom_label( aes( label= start.and.end),  y = 1, label.size = NA, color = "#4D4D4D" ) + # Adding time range label at line start
    geom_point( size=4, pch = 21, bg ="#6A7996") + # Adding points
    coord_flip() +
    theme_classic() +
    geom_text( nudge_y = 0.7, color = "#6A7996", fontface = "bold") + # Adding percentage to points
    theme(axis.ticks = element_blank(), axis.line = element_blank(), axis.text.y = element_text(face="bold")) + # Removing axes and making tick marks bold
    xlab("") +
    ylab(bold("Average relative change in the size of population")~"(logarithmic scale)") + # x-label with partially bold text
    scale_y_continuous(labels = x.axis.labels, breaks= c(0, 2.5, 5, 7.5, 10)) +
    annotate("segment", x = 4, xend = 4, y = 5, yend = 5.5,  arrow = arrow( length=unit(0.15,"cm"), ends = "first", type = "closed"), colour = "#B7B7B7") +
    annotate("text", x = 4, y = 5.5, hjust = 0, size = 3, label = "Between 1960 and 2016, populations\nof brown bears increased by an average of 44%") +
    geom_point( aes( x = 1:length(Common.name.of.species), y = 0.04), colour = "#6A7996",  size=4, pch = 21, bg ="#6A7996")
```
